Name: ArchiCrypt Live
LRW: Legacy supportContainers created with ArchiCrypt Live version 5 use LRW

Name: BitLocker
CBC w/ predictable IVs: no{{Cite journal|author=Niels Fergusson|title=AES-CBC + Elephant Diffuser: A Disk Encryption Algorithm for Windows Vista|accessdate=2008-02-22|publisher=Microsoft|date=August 2006|url=

Name: CipherShed
CBC w/ predictable IVs: Legacy supportContainers created with TrueCrypt versions 1.0 through 4.0 use CBC.
LRW: Legacy supportContainers created with TrueCrypt versions 4.1 through 4.3a use LRW, and support CBC for opening legacy containers only.
XTS: yesContainers created with CipherShed or TrueCrypt versions 5.0+ use XTS, and support LRW/CBC for opening legacy containers only.

Name: Dm-crypt / LUKS
LRW: Yes, using *-lrw-benbiStarting with Linux kernel version 2.6.20, CryptoAPI supports the LRW mode:
column9: title = cryptsetup - manage plain dm-crypt and LUKS encrypted volumes

Name: TrueCrypt
XTS: yesContainers created with TrueCrypt versions 5.0 or later use XTS, and support LRW/CBC for opening legacy containers only.
